forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
